title: Unvaccinated more likely to have heart attack, stroke after COVID, study finds
description: Being fully vaccinated reduced the risk by about 41 percent.

title: Sci-fi becomes real as renowned magazine closes submissions due to AI writers
description: Clarkesworld wrestles with flood of machine-made submissions—over 500 in Feb. alone.

title: Microsoft signs 10-year deal with Nintendo for “full feature” Call of Duty
description: Microsoft makes good on a promise that it hopes the FTC, UK notice.

title: Dealmaster: Big savings on Apple laptops
description: Score big savings on Apple MacBook laptops with M1 or M2 silicon.

title: Reddit should have to identify users who discussed piracy, film studios tell court
description: Plaintiffs say Reddit posts from up to 13 years ago show ISP ignored movie piracy.

title: The big reuse: 25 MWh of ex-car batteries go on the grid in California
description: Batteries with performance too low for driving can still store a lot of charge.

title: Chrome 110 will automatically discard background tabs. Here’s how to stop it.
description: "Memory Saver" will discard and reload idle tabs, which could erase your tab state.

title: New imaging tool confirms female scribe etched her name in medieval manuscript
description: Meet Selene, a new photometric stereo recording prototype. Think of it as 2.5D imaging.

title: ChatGPT failed my course: How bots may change assessment
description: Does ChatGPT spell the end of the essay? No, but it may improve assessment.

title: Russia claims an “external impact” damaged its Progress spacecraft
description: Two Russian spacecraft in two months have been struck this way. Supposedly.

title: Original iPhone from 2007 auctioned for $63,356, topping prior sales
description: Carrier lock-in turned out to be a good thing for one iPhone owner.

title: Changes at the top and in US production as Toyota reiterates its EV strategy
description: Toyota may build a BEV in Kentucky starting in 2025.

title: Texas is planning to make a huge public investment in space
description: "Further investment will cement Texas as the preeminent location for innovation."

title: China plays catch-up to ChatGPT as hype builds around AI
description: Tech giants tout innovations but are disadvantaged by data sets, computing power.

title: Viral Instagram photographer has a confession: His photos are AI-generated
description: Artist wants to "come clean" and highlight a new media process.
